key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers in Asia
Dependence on licensed products, particularly the PAW Patrol franchise
Intense competition from larger toy manufacturers and digital entertainment providers
controversies: Legal disputes, including Matlin v. Spin Master Corp. and George & Co. v. Spin Master Corp.
Allegations of vexatious lawsuits in the George & Co. case
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental impact through sustainable packaging and responsible sourcing
social_issues: Potential labor disputes in supply chain manufacturing
governance_issues: Ethical concerns related to litigation behavior and reputational risks
